hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the location of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_PROFILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the profile of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MEMORY_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the raw memory image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build output paths.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the evidence processing output.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify extra arguments to pass to volatility

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [[ ! -d $OUTPUT_LOCATION ]]; then mkdir $OUTPUT_LOCATION || true; fi vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} --plugins /usr/local/share/volatility/volatilityplugins/community/TomSpencer/ usnparser --output=csv --output-file=${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/usn.csv >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/usnparser_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} --plugins /usr/local/share/volatility/volatilityplugins/volatility-autoruns/ autoruns >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/autoruns_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} --plugins /usr/local/share/volatility/volatilityplugins/community/FrancescoPicasso/ mimikatz >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mimikatz_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} --plugins /usr/local/share/volatility/volatilityplugins/community/DaveLasalle/ firefoxhistory --output=csv --output-file=${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/firefoxhistory.csv >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/firefoxhistory_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} --plugins /usr/local/share/volatility/volatilityplugins/community/DaveLasalle/ chromehistory --output=csv --output-file=${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/chromehistory.csv >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/chromehistory_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} --plugins /usr/local/share/volatility/volatilityplugins/community/DaveLasalle/ prefetch >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/prefetch_output
